text: Melaniya Vytvytska (née: Stelmah; December 31, 1887 – September 9, 1963) was Ukrainian public figure. Activist of the Ukrainian women's movement. The wife of the President of the Ukrainian People's Republic in the exile of Stepan Vytvytskyi. In 1910 she married Stepan Vytvytskyi.
